name: claude-ai-engineering
description: AI Engineering toolkit with Claude Code plugins for learning, project analysis, and multi-agent workflows

plugins.name: learning-summary
plugins.description: Capture and document key learnings from conversations with structured markdown output

plugins.name: project-insight
plugins.description: Comprehensive project analysis using multi-agent insights pipeline

plugins.name: ai-digest
plugins.description: Digest AI/tech articles and content into structured learning documents

plugins.name: spec-interview
plugins.description: AI-driven requirements gathering through in-depth interviews to create comprehensive specifications

plugins.name: ai-news-digest
plugins.description: Aggregates latest AI news from multiple RSS sources and generates curated Top 5 digest on-demand

plugins.name: market-pulse
plugins.description: Financial market analysis dashboard with value investing tools (v2.0). US/Korean/Crypto markets + Graham/Lynch/Buffett analysis + safety margin calculation + GARP screening + investment firm-style reports

plugins.name: future-architect
plugins.description: Organize thoughts and create actionable plans with Mermaid diagrams and prioritized TODOs

plugins.name: competitive-agents
plugins.description: Dual-agent competitive generation with cross-review, improvement rounds, and judge evaluation for plugin creation

plugins.name: portfolio-analyzer-fused
plugins.description: AI-powered portfolio management with multi-agent analysis. Stock scoring, risk analytics, opportunity finding, and conversational advisor (Competitive-Agents Fusion)

plugins.name: spec-validator
plugins.description: Validates implementation code against specification documents using YAML-based checklists and 4-dimension scoring (Competitive-Agents Winner - Agent Beta)

plugins.name: business-avengers
plugins.description: AI partner organization for solo entrepreneurs. 23 AI agents + You as CEO that plan, research, design, develop, market, and monetize your online service from idea to launch with sprint cycles
